MESSAGES.REGISTER: Don't have an account? Register here.
MESSAGES.OIDC-TITLE: Login via your OpenID Connect provider.

FORGOT-PASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot password
FORGOT-PASSWORD.HEADING: Enter your user account's verified email address and we will send you a password reset link.
FORGOT-PASSWORD.EMAIL-SENT-MESSAGE: Check your email for a link to reset your password. If it doesn’t appear within a few minutes, check your spam folder.

CONFIRM-DIALOG.TITLE: Confirm
CONFIRM-DIALOG.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to proceed?

DELETE.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
DELETE.TITLE: Delete

CONFIRM.TRIGGER: Are you sure you want to trigger this job right now?
CONFIRM.PAUSE: Are you sure you want to pause this job?
CONFIRM.RESUME: Are you sure you want to resume this job?
CONFIRM.DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete this job?

FIELDS.NAME: Name
FIELDS.GROUP-HELP: Select an existing job group or create a new job group
FIELDS.CLASS-HELP: Java class that corresponds to the job
FIELDS.IS-DURABLE-HELP: A durable job exists even in the absence of triggers. A non-durable job is deleted once it’s triggers have been executed
FIELDS.LAST-EXECUTION-TIME-HELP: The time when the job was last executed
FIELDS.NEXT-EXECUTION-TIME-HELP: The time when the job will be executed next

CONFIRM.PAUSE: Are you sure you want to pause this trigger?
CONFIRM.RESUME: Are you sure you want to resume this trigger?
CONFIRM.DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete this trigger?

FIELDS.NAME: Name
FIELDS.GROUP-HELP: Select an existing trigger group or create a new trigger group
FIELDS.SIMPLE-TYPE-HELP: Execute exactly once at a specific time, optionally followed by repeated execution at a specific interval. Example: Fire a job at exactly 11:23:54 AM on December 13, 2020 and then fire five more times, every ten seconds
FIELDS.CRON-TYPE-HELP: Execute a job on a recurring calendar based schedule. Example: A job that runs every Sunday at 1AM
FIELDS.START-TIME-HELP: Time on which the job will be triggered
FIELDS.START-DATE-HELP: Date on which the job will be triggered
FIELDS.END-TIME-HELP: Time at which the Trigger should quit repeating - regardless of any remaining repeats (based on the trigger's particular repeat settings)
FIELDS.END-DATE-HELP: Date at which the Trigger should quit repeating - regardless of any remaining repeats (based on the trigger's particular repeat settings)
FIELDS.REPEAT-INTERVAL-HELP: How often the simple job should be triggered
FIELDS.REPEAT-INDEFINITELY-HELP: Whether the simple job should be triggered indefinitely for each repeat interval
FIELDS.REPEAT-COUNT-HELP: The number of times the job should be triggered
FIELDS.LAST-EXECUTION-TIME-HELP: The time when the job was last executed
FIELDS.NEXT-EXECUTION-TIME-HELP: The time when the job will be executed next
